generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings, including pedestrian crossings and directional arrows, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: There are clearly defined pedestrian walkways on both sides of the street, separated from the road by curbs and vegetation, indicating sidewalks.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along the street, including a large, ornate building in the background and commercial structures on either side.
- vegetation: Trees and hedges are present along the sidewalks and in front of some buildings, indicating vegetation.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings, showing a clear, partly cloudy sky.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: A black Audi car is prominently visible in the foreground on the left side of the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible in the distance, driving down the road.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersections, including one on a pole on the left and another on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a "No Parking" sign and a directional sign on the right side of the road.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- rider: The motorcycle in the distance has a rider on it.
- bicycle: No bicycles are visible in the image.
